products.title: Vitra Blackout Ash Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra blackout ash grey 89mm vertical blind in grey. Made to measure from 11.99 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This ash grey blackout vertical blind adds a bold trending shade to your home, whilst blocking the light. Value for money and made from high-quality polyester-based fabric, your new grey blackout vertical blind is perfect for office, bedroom and living rooms.At swift direct blinds, not only is is this dark grey vertical blind hand made to your measurements, by their expert team, it also comes with a free five year guarantee!
 
 Product id: sdb-vtb1337 fabric colour: ash grey material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable   slat width: 89mm slat material: 89mm or 3 1/2 inch slat width control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Vitra Zinc (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure vitra zinc (blackout) blackout vertical blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality blackout vertical blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm
 	min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	louvre width: 89mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
